title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Skills: Integrated Augmented Reality (AR) Utilization in Elementary Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physical education theory, basic digital tool utilization skills, and understanding of the TPACK framework
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core components of the TAM-TPACK framework (PU, PEU, BI, TCK, TPK, TPACK) to the design of elementary physical education AR lessons.
Learners can analyze the perceived usefulness (PU) and ease of use (PEU) of AR technology to design activities aligned with educational objectives.
Based on TPACK principles, learners can develop specific instructional procedures that link AR functionalities with physical education curriculum goals.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
